content.intro: Recovering from surgery is a critical period that requires proper care and attention. Whether you've had a minor procedure or major surgery, the quality of your post-operative care can significantly impact your recovery timeline and overall outcome.

section1.p1: Post-operative care begins the moment you leave the hospital or surgical center. This phase is crucial for preventing complications and ensuring proper healing.
section1.title: Understanding Post-Op Care

section2.p1: Managing pain effectively is essential for a comfortable recovery. Work closely with your healthcare provider to develop a pain management plan that works for you.
section2.quote: Proper pain management isn't just about comfort—it allows patients to participate in necessary activities like walking and deep breathing, which are crucial for preventing complications. - Dr. Sarah Johnson
section2.title: Pain Management at Home
